title: Level 4: Temperature Correlation
description:
Your research team collected snowflake data at different temperatures throughout the winter.

The data shows: timestamp, temperature (°C), and complexity score.

{{input}}

What is the average complexity score for snowflakes formed at temperatures BELOW -15°C?

Round your answer to 1 decimal place.
hint: Filter rows where temperature < -15, then calculate the average of their complexity scores. Use Python's round() function with 1 decimal place.
